trans-unit.source: Represents a legend item, which is stored in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItemsCollection"></xref> class.
The LegendItem class represents a legend item, which can be either a default or custom item: - Default legend items are automatically inserted into the legend for either data series or data points.
Default entries for pie and doughnut charts represent the plotted data points, whereas entries for all other chart types represent the plotted series.
By default, these legend entries use the data point or series color for the symbol color, and the name of the series or data point for the legend item text.

Default legend items can be customized or deleted at run time by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control.
- Custom legend items have user-defined text, symbol color, and so forth.
Unlike the default entries, they are not connected with the plotted data.

Custom legend items can be added at either design time or run time, using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.CustomItems%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend> object.
Legend symbols can be rectangles, lines or markers, depending on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.ImageStyle%2A> property setting of a LegendItem object.
The text of a custom legend item is determined by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.Name%2A> property.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem"></xref> class.
Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem> class.

Note that you can also add custom legend items using the `Add` and `Insert` methods associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.CustomItems%2A> collection property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend> object.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem"></xref> class with the specified name, color and image path.
Only the `image` or `color` parameter needs to be specified.
If both are specified, the `image` parameter has precedence.
The name of the legend item.
The color of the legend item.
The path of the image to be displayed for the legend item.
Gets or sets the orientation for the background gradient of a legend item.
Also determines whether a gradient is used.
Use the BackGradientStyle property to determine whether a title will display a gradient, and to determine the orientation of the gradient if one is used.

This property is only implemented if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.ImageStyle%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle>.
For a listing of available patterns, refer to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle> enumeration.
To use gradient colors: - Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.Color%2A> property to set the primary color.
- Use the BackGradientStyle property to set the secondary color.
- Use this BackGradientStyle property to set the desired gradient style.

> [!NOTE] > This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"></xref> enumeration that specifies the orientation for the background gradient of a legend item.
The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.GradientStyle"></xref>.
Gets or sets the hatching style of a legend item.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle> enumeration specifies the hatch pattern used by a brush of type <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush>.
The hatch pattern consists of a solid background color and lines drawn over the background.
For a listing of available hatching styles, refer to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle> enumeration.
> [!NOTE] > The color of hatching lines is determined by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BackSecondaryColor%2A> property.

> [!NOTE] > This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"></xref> enumeration that specifies the hatching style of a legend item.
The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartHatchStyle"></xref>.
Gets or sets a color which will be replaced with a transparent color when the background image is drawn.

This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that will be displayed as transparent when the background image is drawn.
Gets or sets the secondary color of a legend item.

The BackSecondaryColor property is one of several related properties that determine the secondary background color of many <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> objects; it is used when gradient colors are being applied.

This property is only implemented if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.ImageStyle%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle>.
You can set BackSecondaryColor to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value.
If hatching is used, the BackSecondaryColor property determines the color of the hatching lines for the legend item.
To use gradient colors for a legend cell's background: To use gradient colors: - Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.Color%2A> property to set the primary color.
- Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BackGradientStyle%2A> property to set the secondary color.
- Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BackGradientStyle%2A> property to set the desired gradient style.

> [!NOTE] > This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value used for the secondary color of background with hatching or gradient fill.
The default value is <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>.
Gets or sets the border color of a legend item.
You can set this property to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value.
> [!NOTE] > If you use a marker for a custom legend item.
this property will set the border color of the marker.
However, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerBorderColor%2A> property is also set, its value has precedence.

> [!NOTE] > This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value used to draw the border color of a legend item.
The default color is <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>.
Gets or sets the border style of a legend item.
This property determines the line style used for a border.
The line can be solid, dotted, and so forth.
For other border styles, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle> enumeration topic.

> [!NOTE] > This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartDashStyle"></xref> enumeration value that determines the border style of the legend item.
Gets or sets the border width of a legend item.

The BorderWidth property can also be used to set the width of lines when, for example, custom legend items are displayed with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle> style.

**Note** This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
An<xref uid="langword_csharp_ integer" name=" integer" href=""></xref> value that determines the width, in pixels, of the legend item border.
Gets the collection of cells in the legend item.

A legend item consists of one or more legend cells, each represented by a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> object and stored in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellCollection>.
> [!NOTE] > This property is applicable to the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellCollection"></xref> object that represents the collection of cells in the legend item.
Gets or sets the color of a legend item.
This Color property is one several related properties that get or set the color of many chart elements; it can be set to any ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value.
If this property is set for both a data point and its series, the data point color will have precedence.
The series color will only be used for data points that do not define their own color.
If a custom legend item uses a marker, this property will determine the marker color.
However, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerColor%2A> property is set, its value then has precedence.
This property will be ignored if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.Image%2A> property specifies an image to be used for the legend item symbol.

> [!NOTE] > This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that is used to draw the legend item.
The default color is <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>.
Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether the legend item is enabled.
This property is applicable to the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the legend item is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets the image that will be displayed for a legend item symbol.
This property determines the image file to be used for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem> symbol.
The path can be an absolute or a relative URL.
If you set a background image, that image will be displayed regardless of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.ImageStyle%2A> property setting.
Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BackImageTransparentColor%2A> property to enable one color used by the image to appear transparent.

> [!NOTE] > This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the URL of an image file.
The default value is an empty string.
Gets or sets the display style of the legend item image.
These styles determine how the item's corresponding symbol will be displayed.
A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle> style can be combined with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle> style.
To accomplish this, first set the ImageStyle property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle>.

Then use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerImage%2A> property to specify a marker image, or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerStyle%2A> property to specify a marker style.
The resulting symbol will be a combination of a line and an image or marker.

> [!NOTE] > This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendImageStyle"></xref> enumeration value that specifies the display style of the legend item image.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend"></xref> object associated with this legend item.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend"></xref> object associated with this legend item.
Gets or sets the border color of the markers, if used.

To use markers, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerStyle%2A> property to a value other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.MarkerStyle>.
Note that markers will not be applied to pie, doughnut, and any stacked chart types.
For custom legends, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BorderColor%2A> property will also set the border color of markers.
The MarkerBorderColor property setting has precedence over the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.BorderColor%2A> property setting.

> [!NOTE] > This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that represents the ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) color of a marker border.
Gets or sets the border width of the markers, if used.
Measured in pixels.

This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value that represents the border width of the markers.
The default value is one (1) pixel.
Gets or sets the color of the markers, if used.

This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that represents the color of the markers.
The default color is <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>.
Gets or sets a marker image of the legend item.
Represents a path to an image file, which can be an absolute or relative URL.

To use markers, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerStyle%2A> property to a value other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.MarkerStyle>.
The MarkerImage property takes precedence over the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerColor%2A> property.
A marker image can be any valid graphics file supported by .NET Framework, including icons.
To set one color of the marker image to be transparent, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerImageTransparentColor%2A> property.

> [!NOTE] > This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the URL of an image file.
Gets or sets a color that will be replaced with a transparent color when the marker image is drawn.
The MarkerImageTransparentColor property is used to select one color in a marker image that will be displayed as transparent.
You can set this property to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value.

> [!NOTE] > This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that represents an ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) color that will be replaced with a transparent color when the marker image is drawn.
Gets or sets the size of the legend item markers, if used.

To use markers, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.MarkerStyle%2A> property to a value other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.MarkerStyle>.
Note that markers will not be applied to data points of pie, doughnut and any stacked chart types.

> [!NOTE] > This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> expression that represents the height and width of the plotting area of markers, in pixels.
The default value is 5 pixels.
Gets or sets a legend item marker style.
Also used to enable or disable the display of markers.
To disable markers, set this property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.MarkerStyle>.

> [!NOTE] > This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
A MarkerStyle integer enumeration that specifies a legend item marker style.
The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.MarkerStyle"></xref>.
Gets or sets the name of the legend item.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the name of the legend item.
Gets or sets the color of the legend item separator.
This property is applicable to the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value used to draw the color of the legend item separator.
The default value is <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black*>.
Gets or sets the separator style of the legend item.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendSeparatorStyle"></xref> enumeration value that specifies the separator style of the legend item.
Gets or sets the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"></xref> associated with a default legend item.
This property should only be used in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend> event, to determine which data series a default legend entry represents.
The SeriesName property applies to all charts except pie and sphere charts; their default legend items correspond to plotted data points, and not to plotted series.
When you deal with pie and sphere charts, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.SeriesPointIndex%2A> property instead.
This property should not be set by the developer.
> [!NOTE] > This property is applicable to the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that determines the name of the series associated with a default legend item.
The default value is a zero-length string.
Gets or sets the index of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint"></xref> object associated with a default legend item.

This property should only be used in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.CustomizeLegend> event to determine the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint> object that is represented by a default pie or sphere chart legend entry.
Chart types other than pie or sphere charts will return a negative one (-1), because the default legend items correspond to plotted series, and not plotted data points.
Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.SeriesName%2A> property for these chart types.
This property should not be set by the developer.
> [!NOTE] > This property is applicable to the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>.
An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value that represents the location of the default legend's associated data point in a zero-based index.
All chart types except for pie and doughnut charts will return a negative one (-1).
Gets or sets the shadow color of a legend item.
Gets or sets the shadow color of several chart elements, and can be set to any valid ARGB (alpha, red, green, blue) value.
The alpha value can be used to achieve a "realistic" shadowing effect; try using a color of "128,0,0,0" for shadows.
To implement a shadow, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem.ShadowOffset%2A> property to a value other than zero (0).

**Note** This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> value that represents the shadow color of a legend item.
The default color is <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Black*>.
Gets or sets the shadow offset, in pixels, of a legend item.
To implement shadowing, use a value other than zero (0).
A positive value will result in a shadow that shifts down and to the right.
A negative value will result in a shadow that shifts up and to the left.

**Note** This property is applicable only to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCell> objects with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> of either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendCellType>.
An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value that represents the shadow offset, in pixels, of the relevant chart element.
Gets or sets the tooltip of the legend item.
This property allows you to set special keywords to display different types of chart-related data.
For more information, see [Keywords [rs_vsDataVis]](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
> [!NOTE] > This property is applicable to the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.LegendItem>.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the tooltip for the legend item.
